title: Ramboda - Delta Estate
details:
The Magnificent estate in “Ramboda - Delta”which attract foreign tourist, Serene and calm environment. Ideal place to spend your leisure time with cool and misty environment. Natural beauty of the location add value to this prime place. Quick and easy access to the main road. provided with all the basic facilities. A breath taking 360 view of the magnificent mountain range. Your Own Tea Estate

Benefits we offer;
3 phase electricity and water connection.
15ft – 20 ft wide accessible roads to the land
Easy Payment Schemes with up to 12 months interest free
Up to 10 years Easy Payment plans
